alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 19 at 2:11AM EST until January 20 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.7 to 4.9 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Nantucket MA County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday morning, especially around the Saturday morning high tide. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property, especially on Easy Street. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 19/07 AM 3.7/ 4.2 0.2/ 0.7 0.4/ 0.9 2 None 19/07 PM 3.6/ 4.1 0.0/ 0.5 1.0/ 1.5 2-3 None 20/07 AM 4.6/ 5.1 1.0/ 1.5 1.2/ 1.7 3 None 20/08 PM 3.2/ 3.7 -0.3/ 0.2 0.8/ 1.3 3 None 21/08 AM 4.2/ 4.7 0.6/ 1.1 0.8/ 1.3 2-3 None 21/09 PM 2.7/ 3.2 -0.9/-0.4 0.4/ 0.9 2 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
